items.name: Kingmaker
explicitMods: 348% increased Physical Damage
7% increased Attack Speed
36% increased Critical Strike Chance
Nearby Allies have 30% increased Item Rarity
Nearby Allies have Culling Strike
Insufficient Mana doesn't prevent your Melee Attacks
Nearby Allies have +50% to Critical Strike Multiplier
Nearby Allies have +10 Fortification
flavourText: A King and his people are linked together
like a soul and a beating heart.
Both can be severed by a same edge,
then forged anew.

items.name: Anathema
explicitMods: +31 to Intelligence
11% increased Cast Speed
11% chance to gain a Power Charge when you Cast a Curse Spell
Your Curse Limit is equal to your maximum Power Charges
flavourText: Enraged by the incompetence of mortals
The demon-lord opens a gateway
Unleashing a litany of pain upon the world.

items.name: Replica Doedre's Damning
explicitMods: +8 to Intelligence
+19% to all Elemental Resistances
Gain 14 Mana per Enemy Killed
You can apply one fewer Curse
15% increased Effect of your Curses
flavourText: "Prototype #8 makes it difficult to think negatively, but two fatalities
resulted when a lead researcher used an epithet in its presence."

items.name: Victario's Influence
implicitMods: +2 to Level of Socketed Duration Gems
+2 to Level of Socketed Curse Gems
explicitMods: +1 to Level of Socketed Aura Gems
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 30 Generosity
Socketed Gems have 45% increased Reservation Efficiency
143% increased Evasion and Energy Shield
25% increased Area of Effect of Aura Skills
14% increased effect of Non-Curse Auras from your Skills
flavourText: "Every life is a story.
If you're not writing your own,
you'd better know who's writing it for you!"
- Victario, the People's Poet

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports hex curse skills, turning them into auras that will apply their effect to all enemies in an area around you.
explicitMods:
Supported Curse Skills apply their Curses as Auras
Supported Curse Skills also count as Aura Skills
Using Supported Skills is Instant
25% less Effect of Supported Curses
104% increased Area of Effect of Supported Curse Skills
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses all targets in an area, lowering their elemental resistances.
explicitMods: Base duration is 12.00 seconds
+1 metre to radius
Cursed enemies have -30% to Elemental Resistances
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses all enemies in an area, lowering their action speed and making other effects on them expire more slowly.

+1 metre to radius
50% less Effect of Curse against Players
Cursed Normal and Magic Enemies have 30% less Action Speed
Other effects on Cursed enemies expire 25% slower
Cursed Rare and Unique Enemies have 19% less Action Speed
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses all targets in an area, reducing their accuracy and making them deal less damage.

+1 metre to radius

items.name: Mask of the Tribunal
explicitMods: +29 to all Attributes
167% increased Armour and Energy Shield
Nearby Allies have 1% Chance to Block Attack Damage per 100 Strength you have
Nearby Allies have +8% to Critical Strike Multiplier per 100 Dexterity you have
Nearby Allies have 3% increased Cast Speed per 100 Intelligence you have
2% increased Mana Reservation Efficiency of Skills per 250 total Attributes
flavourText: The judge determines worthiness by comparison to the paragon: himself.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses all targets in an area, causing them to be debilitated when they hit enemies and increasing damage they take while on low life.
explicitMods: Base duration is 12.00 seconds
+1 metre to radius
Cursed Enemies take 60% increased Damage while on Low Life
Cursed Enemies are Debilitated for 2.00 Seconds when they Hit
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Star of Wraeclast
explicitMods: Grants Level 10 Frostblink Skill
41% increased Cold Damage
+10% to all Elemental Resistances
60% increased Area of Effect of Hex Skills
You cannot be Cursed with Silence
Frostblink has 50% increased Duration
flavourText: "I offer to you an eternal oath
that binds your heart to mine;
a bond that not even death will break.
Will you accept?"
- Daresso, to his beloved

items.name: Windscream
explicitMods: 52% increased Armour
+12% to all Elemental Resistances
20% increased Movement Speed
You can apply an additional Curse
50% increased Area of Effect of Hex Skills
flavourText: The mocking wind, a shielding spell,
The haunting screams, a maddening hell.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants additional energy shield and increased energy shield recharge rate to you and your allies.
explicitMods: +0.1 metres to radius
You and nearby allies gain 69 additional Energy Shield
You and nearby Allies gain 30% increased Energy Shield Recharge Rate

explicitMods: Base duration is 3.00 seconds

+0.1 metres to radius
Your and nearby allies' Energy Shield Recharges are not delayed by Damage

properties.name: Spell, AoE, Duration, Fire, Physical, Guard

socketedItems.secDescrText: Applies a buff that adds to your armour, and can take some of the damage from hits for you before being depleted. When the buff expires or is depleted, the skill deals reflected damage to enemies around you based on the total damage that was taken from the buff. Shares a cooldown with other Guard skills.
explicitMods: Base duration is 3.00 seconds
This Skill's Cooldown does not recover during its effect

75% of Damage from Hits is taken from the Buff before your Life or Energy Shield
Buff can take Damage equal to 10% of your Armour, up to a maximum of 5000
Reflects 100% of Damage taken from Buff as Fire Damage when Buff expires or is depleted
Buff grants +50 to Armour
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Each supported spell skill will track damage you take, and be triggered when the total damage taken reaches a threshold. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps, or mines. Vaal skills, channelling skills, and skills with a reservation cannot be triggered.
explicitMods: This Gem can only Support Skill Gems requiring Level 54 or lower
Supported Skills deal 49% less Damage
You cannot Cast Supported Triggerable Spells directly
Trigger Supported Spells when you take 1221 total Damage from Hits
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Southbound
explicitMods: Adds 67 to 89 Cold Damage to Attacks
13% increased maximum Life
+50% to Cold Resistance
100% increased Freeze Duration on Enemies
Your Hits can only Kill Frozen Enemies
flavourText: Far south, the winter crawls under the skin.
Below the snow, adrift wanderers sleep.

items.name: Honour Shackle
explicitMods: +34 to Strength and Dexterity
+13 to maximum Energy Shield
Regenerate 35.3 Life per second
